title: Ariana Grande, Selena Gomez, & Demi Lovato Had a Twitter Love Fest
text: Ariana Grande initiated a Twitter love fest between herself, Selena Gomez, and Demi Lovato on Saturday afternoon! The 22-year-old singer, who is getting ready to release her next single “Focus,” praised both of the artists for their new albums. “i love nothing more than seeing young women doing what they love & kicking ass at [...] »
